LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista.label: ballista
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista.description: A large siege weapon originally developed by the Romans. fires a the equivalent of a massive crossbow bolt. Must me manned.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista_Blueprint.label: ballista (blueprint)
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista_Frame.label: ballista (building)
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista_Frame.description: A large siege weapon originally developed by the Romans. fires a the equivalent of a massive crossbow bolt. Must me manned.
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult.label: catapult
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult.description: A catapult that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult_Blueprint.label: catapult (blueprint)
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult_Frame.label: catapult (building)
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult_Frame.description: A catapult that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.label: sentry light turret
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.description: An AI-controlled turret that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Requires 700 W to function.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_Blueprint.label: sentry light turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_Frame.label: sentry light turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_Frame.description: An AI-controlled turret that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Requires 700 W to function.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster.label: sentry blaster turret
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster.description: An AI-controlled turret equipped with a charge blaster. Requires 1,200 W to function.\nCaliber: 6x24mmCharged
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Blueprint.label: sentry blaster turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Blueprint_Install.label: sentry blaster turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Frame.label: sentry blaster turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Frame.description: An AI-controlled turret equipped with a charge blaster. Requires 1,200 W to function.\nCaliber: 6x24mmCharged
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.label: sentry laserbeam turret
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.description: An AI-controlled highly calibrated gun turret with advanced optics. This allows it to deliver a single but precise laserbeam at fairly long distances. Requires 1,500 W to function.\nCaliber: Charged laser beam
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Blueprint.label: sentry laserbeam turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Blueprint_Install.label: sentry laserbeam turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Frame.label: sentry laserbeam turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Frame.description: An AI-controlled highly calibrated gun turret with advanced optics. This allows it to deliver a single but precise laserbeam at fairly long distances. Requires 1,500 W to function.\nCaliber: Charged laser beam
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.label: sentry heavy turret
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.description: An AI-controlled plated automatic turret with large caliber machine gun. Very resistant to damage. Requires 1,800 W to function.\nCaliber: 14.5x114mm
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Blueprint.label: sentry heavy turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Frame.label: sentry heavy turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Frame.description: An AI-controlled plated automatic turret with large caliber machine gun. Very resistant to damage. Requires 1,800 W to function.\nCaliber: 14.5x114mm
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun.label: sentry naval turret
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun.description: An AI-controlled 35mm autocannon turret automatically fires at enemies. It requires 2,200 W to function. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.\nCaliber: 30x173mm
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun_Blueprint.label: sentry naval turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun_Frame.label: sentry naval turret (building)
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun_Frame.description: An AI-controlled 35mm autocannon turret automatically fires at enemies. It requires 2,200 W to function. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.\nCaliber: 30x173mm
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher.label: sentry rocket launcher
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher.description: An AI-controlled sentry turret with rocket launcher. Requires 1,600 W to function.\nCaliber: AT Missile
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher_Frame.label: sentry rocket launcher (building)
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher_Frame.descri: An AI-controlled sentry turret with rocket launcher. Requires 1,600 W to function.\nCaliber: AT Missile
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.label: 81mm artillery mortar
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.description: A mortar that launches explosive shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Blueprint.label: 81mm artillery mortar (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Frame.label: 81mm artillery mortar (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Frame.description: A mortar that launches explosive shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.label: 81mm mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.description: Lobs mortar shells on a high arc. Very inaccurate but long-ranged and capable of indirect fire.
LanguageData.Turret_M240B.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG
LanguageData.Turret_M240B.description: M240B medium machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Blueprint.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Blueprint_Install.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Frame.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG (building)
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Frame.description: M240B medium machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning.description: A manned, mounted M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun. It uses .50 BMG Bullets for ammo and fires in a 15 round burst.
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning_Blueprint.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning_Frame.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG (building)
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning_Frame.description: A manned, mounted M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun. It uses .50 BMG Bullets for ammo and fires in a 15 round burst.
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun.label: M134 minigun
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun_Blueprint.label: M134 minigun (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun_Blueprint_Install.label: M134 minigun (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun_Frame.label: M134 minigun (building)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV.label: 14.5mm KPV MG
LanguageData.Turret_KPV.description: KPV heavy machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Blueprint.label: 14.5mm KPV MG (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Blueprint_Install.label: 14.5mm KPV MG (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Frame.label: 14.5mm KPV MG (building)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Frame.description: KPV heavy machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun.label: 30mm GAU-8 Avenger
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun.description: A manned turret mounted with a GAU-8 Avenger Fire Cannon that shoots at enemies. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. It uses 30x173mm cartridge for ammo. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Blueprint.label: 30mm GAU-8 Avenger (blueprint)
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Blueprint_Install.label: 30mm GAU-8 Avenger (blueprint)
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Frame.label: 30mm GAU-8 Avenger (building)
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Frame.description: A manned turret mounted with a GAU-8 Avenger Fire Cannon that shoots at enemies. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. It uses 30x173mm cartridge for ammo. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon.label: 20mm Oerlikon autocannon
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon.description: A manned turret mounted with a 20mm Oerlikon autocannon. It deals armor-piercing damage. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 20x102mm rounds for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon_Frame.label: 20mm Oerlikon autocannon (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon_Frame.descript: A manned turret mounted with a 20mm Oerlikon autocannon. It deals armor-piercing damage. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 20x102mm rounds for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon.label: 20mm Vulcan cannon
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon.description: A fortified tower with a mounted 20mm Vulcan Cannon. It requires 800 W to function. It fires a quick, continuous stream of 20 bullets. Its high placement allows for a much longer range, but unfortunately due to that it can't aim directly down or close to itself and can't be placed indoors. It creates a sizable explosion when destroyed.
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon_Blueprint.label: 20mm Vulcan cannon (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon_Frame.label: 20mm Vulcan cannon (building)
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon_Frame.description: A fortified tower with a mounted 20mm Vulcan Cannon. It requires 800 W to function. It fires a quick, continuous stream of 20 bullets. Its high placement allows for a much longer range, but unfortunately due to that it can't aim directly down or close to itself and can't be placed indoors. It creates a sizable explosion when destroyed.
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty.label: AGS-17
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty_Blueprint.label: AGS-17 (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty_Blueprint_Install.label: AGS-17 (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty_Frame.label: AGS-17 (building)
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher.label: AGS-30
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher.description: A manned 30mm Grenade Launcher mounted on a turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo. It fires a burst of 6 explosive grenades over medium distances.
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher_Frame.label: AGS-30 (building)
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher_Frame.descri: A manned 30mm Grenade Launcher mounted on a turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo. It fires a burst of 6 explosive grenades over medium distances.
LanguageData.Turret_Flak.label: 90mm flak turret
LanguageData.Turret_Flak.description: Old school anti-aircraft cannon. Ineffective against modern aviation but still popular on rimworlds for use against entrenched enemies and vehicles.
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Blueprint.label: 90mm flak turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Blueprint_Install.label: 90mm flak turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Frame.label: 90mm flak turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Frame.description: Old school anti-aircraft cannon. Ineffective against modern aviation but still popular on rimworlds for use against entrenched enemies and vehicles.
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon.label: 120mm tank cannon turret
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon.description: A turret mounted with a 120mm tank gun. It can fire an explosive shell long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. The turret will explode when heavily damaged. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Blueprint.label: 120mm tank cannon turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Blueprint_Install.label: 120mm tank cannon turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Frame.label: 120mm tank cannon turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Frame.description: A turret mounted with a 120mm tank gun. It can fire an explosive shell long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. The turret will explode when heavily damaged. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun.label: 155mm Howitzer cannon turret
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun.description: A turret mounted with a 155mm Howitzer Cannon. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun_Blueprint.label: 155mm Howitzer cannon turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun_Frame.label: 155mm Howitzer cannon turret (building)
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun_Frame.description: A turret mounted with a 155mm Howitzer Cannon. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher.label: BGM-71 TOW
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher.description: The TOW ("Tube-launched, Optically-tracked, Wire-guided") launcher is an anti-tank missile. First produced in 1970, the TOW is one of the most widely used anti-tank guided missiles.
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher_Blueprint.label: BGM-71 TOW (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher_Frame.label: BGM-71 TOW (building)
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher_Frame.description: The TOW ("Tube-launched, Optically-tracked, Wire-guided") launcher is an anti-tank missile. First produced in 1970, the TOW is one of the most widely used anti-tank guided missiles.
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem.description: The Light Missile System fires 1 missile at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Blueprint.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin (blueprint)
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Frame.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin (building)
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Frame.description: The Light Missile System fires 1 missile at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem.label: Medium missile system
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem.description: The Medium Missile System fires 3 missiles at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Blueprint.label: Medium missile system (blueprint)
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Frame.label: Medium missile system (building)
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Frame.description: The Medium Missile System fires 3 missiles at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.RLGun.label: Heavy missile system
LanguageData.RLGun.description: The Heavy Missile System fires 6 missiles at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.RLGun_Blueprint.label: Heavy missile system (blueprint)
LanguageData.RLGun_Blueprint_Install.label: Heavy missile system (blueprint)
LanguageData.RLGun_Frame.label: Heavy missile system (building)
LanguageData.RLGun_Frame.description: The Heavy Missile System fires 6 missiles at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.
